name: Poly Party
description:
Welcome to Poly Party! A game of games, still in development, but a lot to do! Play some boardgames and minigames in Party Mode. Roam and explore the City where you can buy, obtain, upgrade and customize cars, as well as work odd jobs, participate in missions, race, play arcade games, and more in City Explorer. Race your cars in Racer Nation, where you can race in circuits, time trials, and events with various rewards!

A lot to do so far but a lot more to come!
